flute.name: FLUTE
flute.description: A small, ornate flute made of polished silver. It feels cool to the touch.
flute.flavor_text: As you hold it in your hands, you can almost hear a faint melody echoing from within.

wedding_band.name: WEDDING BAND
wedding_band.description: A thin, band of white gold, a sign of a covenant, and a key to multiple futures.
wedding_band.flavor_text: It feels warm on your finger, humming with a gentle energy.

knife.name: KNIFE
knife.description: A small knife with a sharp blade and a wooden handle. It seems like there's blood on the handle.
knife.flavor_text: The blade gleams with a faint light, as if it has been recently polished.

figurine.name: FIGURINE
figurine.description: A small statue, carved in a reddish wood; A man kneeling, and holding a hoop in both hands.
figurine.flavor_text: The hoop looks big enough for a finger.

crown.name: CROWN
crown.description: An ornate diadem of white gold, a sapphire is set in the center.
crown.flavor_text: You can imagine yourself standing confidently if you put it on.

dog_treat.name: BACON
dog_treat.description: A delicious-looking dog treat. It smells like bacon.
dog_treat.flavor_text: The dog seems to be eyeing this with great interest.
